Author: kalianda
Text: the measurement most likely to fluctuate a lot on me is my waist measurement (probably because it's affected by the size of recent meals) and I usually do see food weight reflected in my waist measurement.  if my exercise routine hasn't changed then a change in thigh, lower hips, or arm usually means I lost or gained weight more permanently beyond just food weight. I actually thought about never measuring my waist because of that...

Author: goodbyeruby2sday
Text: It's unlikely that you gained and stayed the same measurements, mine fluctuate a lot with only a few lbs in some areas. You should be fine don't worry about it, keep an eye on your measurements but don't worry you can't gain more than a couple if pounds, if that,  and not see any change at all.
